  • Rated 5 out of 5 stars

    Great light weight travel lens

    Owned for 2 weeks by when reviewed.

    With Sony cameras it a good travel lens, you do have trade offs though, its all electronic, feels a little mushy but its has a great range and is supper sharp. For a light weight video rig it cant be beat.

  • Rated 5 out of 5 stars

    Great Sony Lens

    |

    Sony is doing great, this lens is awesome. This basically now makes my DSLR an ENG camera as well. These new Sony lens work for my a7s cameras great. I hope to buy more Sony Lenses in the future. With all these new Sony Lenses on the market, Canon and Panasonic should be very concerned.
